channel.title: [Questions, Questions, Questions, and a possible project]
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]Question 1.)[/glow]
People trying to log into my server have either "Invalid login request", "Your account is already logged in", or "please use a different world". Any way to fix this? I've tried everything, and as you people know I'm just learning Java so I probably messed up somewhere.
[glow=red,2,300]Question 2.)[/glow]
I am running HSV2.0B (HybridScape 2.0) and when I tried to add Castlewars to it, their is part of the code missing that I need to put the Castle Wars code after, so I do not have any idea where to put it. Any ideas?
And now......bum......bum..........bum.............BUM!....The Project Idea!
[u][b]Project UltiRune[/b][/u] Would it be possible.....if we had all the OBJECTIDs, to make new towns? If that is possible, then I am wondering if we could make somesorta program using Java (like a map editor) so that people could simply type in an objectID and click were they wanted it? Also, new quests? Could these be written? These things could all SPICE up a private server. Well, anyways, if this cannot be done, don't call me a noob please. Just thought of it last night. So...also...if it could be done...don't go starting right away, we will need to figure stuff out. And, as I mentioned above, I could not do much of the coding. :( But I am learning :D.
Sincerly,
AkRiAm [br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 01:59:50 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 02:19:33 pm[/size][hr]Anyone got some ideas or constructive critisizme or answers?

item.title: [Questions, Questions, Questions, and a possible project]
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

I made a new city sorta… I learned how to edit objects on runestatus and made another area into a demonic realm but if your talking about a new area in one of the black areas… you need to find tile IDs or else you cant walk there and I only know a couple tile IDs…

item.title: [Questions, Questions, Questions, and a possible project]
item.dc:creator: @kxolsd kxolsd
item.description:
@kxolsd wrote:

For the “Invalid login request” and other server log-in errors:
Just copy a file and edit in your details, and I guess stats. I just leave mine at 1 most of the time.

Read full topic

item.title: [Questions, Questions, Questions, and a possible project]
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Well its good that im getting feedback. We could start simple and grow to, just as everything else does. It would develop into RS3 :). So what do you guys say? Should we try?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 03:19:00 pm[/size][hr]If you think this could work and want to help, post please! +)[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 03:54:45 pm[/size][hr]So…[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 04:07:34 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 05:29:45 pm[/size][hr]Lol i want someone to post!!!

they created new items and towns and quests and people as creative enough could aswell

THE CATCH: Takes tooooooooooooo long

but then again if it can be done, we could make an interly new game, something that isnt even runescape (doesnt look like it at all)

HUGE THING IT WILL BE, if it were to happen , prob not

item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]Question 1.)[/glow]

People trying to log into my server have either “Invalid login request”, “Your account is already logged in”, or “please use a different world”. Any way to fix this? I’ve tried everything, and as you people know I’m just learning Java so I probably messed up somewhere.

[glow=red,2,300]Question 2.)[/glow]

I am running HSV2.0B (HybridScape 2.0) and when I tried to add Castlewars to it, their is part of the code missing that I need to put the Castle Wars code after, so I do not have any idea where to put it. Any ideas?

And now…bum…bum…bum…BUM!..The Project Idea!

Project UltiRune
Would it be possible…if we had all the OBJECTIDs, to make new towns?
If that is possible, then I am wondering if we could make somesorta program using Java (like a map editor) so that people could simply type in an objectID and click were they wanted it? Also, new quests? Could these be written? These things could all SPICE up a private server. Well, anyways, if this cannot be done, don’t call me a noob please. Just thought of it last night. So…also…if it could be done…don’t go starting right away, we will need to figure stuff out. And, as I mentioned above, I could not do much of the coding. But I am learning :D.

Sincerly,
